metadata.dc:author: Gómez, M
Doménech, E
Gras, J R
Talavera, J
metadata.dc:description: We find that the treatment indicated for bilateral choanal atresia in the newborn is the transnasal approach, maintaining the patency by means of soft tubes (endotracheal) through 5-7 weeks. The few which recurred were managed by the transpalatal technique. The AA. describe their own experience in 10 cases seen at the ENT-department of the Servasa Hospital, Alicante, between 1979-1989.
metadata.dc:title: Corrección quirúrgica de la atresia de coanas. Nuestra experiencia en los casos.
[Surgical correction of choanal atresia. Our personal experience].
